name: Hotel Das President Wien

reviews.title: The 70s today
reviews.text: I got this hotel for €55 per night and booked it for a short stay. The staff were nice, breakfast ok but nothing special. The most funn thing however, was the room. The furniture, and decoration was like straight out of the 70s. So if you'd like to try a retro-weekend, a room here might be ok! Even the radio was from the 70s (but not the tv).

aka: Golden Tulip Wien City Hotel Vienna
description: NOW privately owned and operative as Hotel Das President Wien! Renamed as The Hotel DAS PRESIDENT Wien(ex Ibis Styles Wien President) and privately owned we strive to improve guest satisfaction step by stept. Look out for specials in the upcoming months! The Hotel DAS PRESIDENT is located opposite the famous Raimund Theatre, close to the international Railway Station " Westbahnhof" and Viennas biggest shopping street Mariahilferstrasse. The heart of Vienna with the Stephansplatz, Opera and many other sightseeing points are only a 9 minute subway drive away. Arriving in Vienna from the airport, the hotel is easily reached by bus, train/ subaway or taxi. The hotel is just off the Gürtel into the 6. district of Vienna, which makes it easily accessible by car. The Hotel DAS PRESIDENT ( ex Ibis Styles Wien President) offers its guests the personal flair of the only retro city center hotel where you can see and feel the welcoming hospitality. Our stuff aims to fulfill all your needs so that it will be an unforgettable in Vienna and in our hotel. The Hotel DAS PRESIDENT (ex Ibis Styles Wien President) was built in the style of a modern city center hotel. The hotel offers not only 60 comfortable standard rooms with double or twin beds, but also 12 family rooms and 5 studios with own roof terrace,a conference room with a capacity for 40 persons and a garage. Client satisfaction is our most important aim. Our friendly and helpful staff will assist you if you would like to book a sightseeing tour in Vienna and they will reserve you any kind of tickets for concerts or other events in town.
